p: We analyzed all known ZIKV importations into Texas from January 2016 to September 2017, including the county and notification date; county-level purchasing power parity (PPP) in US dollars [ 18]; daily temperature data at a 5 km x 5 km resolution for 2016-2017 and historical averages from 1960-1990 [ 19, 20]. For each county and month, we averaged daily temperatures across all 5 km x 5 km grid cells whose center fell within the county; we aggregated 5 km x 5 km mosquito ( Aedes aegypti) occurrence probabilities similarly [ 21]. Those data are available at dx.doi.org/10.18738/T8/HYZ53B.
